title: [PETITION] : GAREN GETS 1 AD IF HE DOES 100 PUSH UPS
body:
{{champion:86}} gets +1 ad if he does 100 push ups ( maximum bonus ad  obtainable is 1 ) 
and then he gets a buff named : '' Garen is buffed   : Garen did 100 push ups '' 
cmon rito
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

EDIT : better make it a quest lol

replies.body: Are you serious? That would be break him to ungodly levels as he runs rampant with IE. If anything, Garen needs a gigantic nerf to his mana regen and hybrid penetration.
Garen doesn't have mana though.. why would he need a nerf to mana regen XD

http://i.imgur.com/F636xiP.gif
Edit: Cmon guys be cool, stop downvoting the guy. He made an honest mistake, meme and move on.
https://i.imgflip.com/szh1g.jpg
http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=https%3A%2F%2Fi.imgflip.com%2Fszh1g.jpg&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150
Upvoted for incredibly meta use of meme.
This. This is fucking amazing.
https://media.giphy.com/media/NvwLXMoF3fUze/giphy.gif

That gif is amazing.

http://i.imgur.com/b0MUPhQ.png[/img]

Soooo jokes can do Hohmann transfers and gravity assists?
kool
*whoooosh*

upvoted for clarity..... but yeah

the joke
.
.
.
. 
your head

> [{quoted}](name=2zjMonkey,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L3iRxzR1,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2016-08-14T22:49:55.348+0000)
>
> Garen doesn't have mana though.. why would he need a nerf to mana regen XD

Woosh.
oh yes
He should have a five minute 1 movement debuff for sore muscles afterwards

He did pushups. why would his legs be sore. 

The debuff should be on AD. Gain +1 AD for 100pushups, lose 1 damage from autos.

Balanced.
Because he skipped leg day
Those arms are dragging him down man

> [{quoted}](name=redfeenix,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L3iRxzR1,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-08-14T22:12:12.658+0000)
>
> ...lose 1 damage from autos.

But not spins. NEVER SPINS. YOU DO NOT TOUCH THE WIN SPIN. >:(
thats actually debuff if you count armor.  1 AD does less than 1 damage

Not if your attacking a villian.

Because true damage.
Its all fun in games until you sit in lane like an idiot doing push ups for 2 minutes
Then it's fun and games with MUSCLE!
the fitness grand pacertest...

> [{quoted}](name=xXxRenektonxXx23,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L3iRxzR1,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2016-08-15T09:31:49.354+0000)
>
> the fitness grand pacertest...

The Pacer test is for running though.
It would work cuz of how much time he spends underneath his turret
or in brush
Riot doesn't have the technology for that.

Never underestimate the power of {{champion:17}} 

I mean Rito.

> [{quoted}](name=MagikarpIsBoss,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L3iRxzR1,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-14T21:32:31.206+0000)
>
> Never underestimate the power of {{champion:17}} 
> 
> I mean Rito.

Your good m8. It's reasonable that you mixed the two.

> [{quoted}](name=MagikarpIsBoss,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L3iRxzR1,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-14T21:32:31.206+0000)
>
> Never underestimate the power of {{champion:17}} 
> 
> I mean Rito.

riot is satan?
Riot exist so no

> [{quoted}](name=JayLord,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L3iRxzR1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-14T21:14:23.385+0000)
>
> Riot doesn't have the technology for that.

They do. Record the total amount of time the emote is playing, they know when the character is in the emote state (Thats how it knows to play the animation i'd assume). So just find out how much time is needed for 100 pushups, then record total time spent in that emote, and bam! Done it
Only if Morde gets 0.5 percent more AS when shredding his mace/axeguitar a hundred times!
https://media.giphy.com/media/k4hbLipMGaO2I/giphy.gif
Finally while playing Bush-ren I can do something useful while waiting
IF GAREN GETS A BUFF FOR THEM PUSH UPS, Braum needs on too.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Great idea, but everyone that tries to get the buff would just be reported for trolling. Although I'm not even sure trolls would want just 1 AD

trolls do 99, and then just laugh.
{{champion:86}} -teed to happen
I pictuer diamond elo players doing push-ups in between cs :D
Every point matters.
i think he should get 1 Ability Power too.

But what if he is against katarina?


[http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/e/ee/Garen.Katarinajoke1.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20130914214540](http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/e/ee/Garen.Katarinajoke1.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20130914214540)

Does this give him 70 AD?
LeL

I don't support, this will make Garen heavily OP. That 1 AD will ridiculously scale into late-game making him completely unstoppable and Rito will have to nerf him to the point where he might have to do sit-ups instead of push-ups. 

You don't want that to happen do you?

How funny would it be if they made a champ that just stopped and did exercises if left alone for long enough and he actually got buffs from it. Would have to be in proximity to an enemy or drag/baron/harold.. but would be a pretty hilarious interaction/passive.
{{champion:23}}  is gonna feel left out. Now his right arm is going to be surpassed by {{champion:86}} 's left arm.

only if he's not allowed to do it in base, he has to do push ups in public so he feels like a big man

that and so he doesn't get it for doing push ups before the game starts for that 1 ad that could MAYBE swing things.
Excellent idea!
